archiefmat.titel: Staatkundige en militaire aangelegenheden vanaf 19 januari 1795 - Briefwisseling met J.C. Hartsinck, gezant
archiefmat.titel_eng: Political and military affairs from the 19 January 1795 - Correspondence with J.C. Hartsinck, diplomatic representative
archiefmat.scope: Including a report of P.B. van Starckenborgh concerning the events on Curaçao, 1795-1797 (letter of 16-7-1799)
archiefmat.notes: Only approved consultation permitted. See also no. 1860 (P.B. van Starckenborgh).
